page.title: 08MY SATURDAY
page.content: On Saturday I get up early, go to the toilet and then back to my room, brush my hair and bring a pillow into the living_room where I watch television until noon. I then have my breakfast, get dressed and go out to play - perhaps at football. After lunch I take my dog Shane for a walk around Hogganfield Loch then return home to share a game of pool or darts with my brother. After tea, I usually go outside to play and get called in at 9.45 p.m. When I get into the house I am fed again. Then I get my nightie on and watch the Saturday Film on television. After the film, I'm always tired, so I drop into bed. Before you know it, I'm asleep. { (An 11 year old)
